module.landingpage.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
module.landingpage.faq.q1.question: Can I edit the birthday page after purchase?
module.landingpage.faq.q1.answer: No, the birthday page cannot be edited after purchase. Once created, all the details are final.
module.landingpage.faq.q2.question: How long will the page stay online?
module.landingpage.faq.q2.answer: The page duration depends on your chosen plan. The Basic plan gives you access for 1 year, while the Premium plan provides lifetime access with no expiration.
module.landingpage.faq.q3.question: Is there a free trial?
module.landingpage.faq.q3.answer: We do not offer a free trial, but we provide a one-time purchase with lifetime access for Premium users.
module.landingpage.faq.q4.question: Can I add music to the birthday page?
module.landingpage.faq.q4.answer: No, music uploads are not supported at this time. The page allows images but does not include an audio feature.
module.landingpage.faq.q5.question: Can I upload videos and images?
module.landingpage.faq.q5.answer: You can upload images to personalize the birthday page. However, video uploads are not supported.
module.landingpage.faq.q6.question: How can I share the birthday page?
module.landingpage.faq.q6.answer: After purchase, you will receive a unique link and a QR code that you can easily share with family and friends.
module.landingpage.faq.q7.question: Do I need to renew my purchase every year?
module.landingpage.faq.q7.answer: No! The Premium plan offers lifetime access, while the Basic plan lasts for 1 year. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions.
module.landingpage.faq.q8.question: Can I choose different themes for the birthday page?
module.landingpage.faq.q8.answer: Yes! You can select from multiple beautifully designed themes to match the birthday celebration.
module.landingpage.faq.q9.question: Can I create multiple birthday pages with one purchase?
module.landingpage.faq.q9.answer: No, each purchase grants access to create only one personalized birthday page. If you need another, you will need to make a new purchase.
